name: AVG Diagnostics File
summary: Learn about .AVGDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: AVGDX files are sent by an AVG technical support representative to a user who is having technical difficulties with the AVG software. When you open the file, you can click the Diagnose and send results button, and the diagnostics tool runs and automatically sends the collected information to the AVG technical support center for diagnosis.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
